product.name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
product.how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

hero_summary.short: 10% Vitamin C serum with Hyaluronic Acid — brightens skin and helps fade dark spots. Suitable for oily and combination skin.
highlights: Formulated for Oily and Combination skin types

benefits_block.title: Benefits
bullets: Brightening — supports a more radiant complexion
Helps fade dark spots over consistent use
benefits_block.summary: GlowBoost focuses on brightening and reducing pigmentation concerns.

usage_block.title: How to Use
usage_block.instructions: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen.
usage_block.notes: Introduce gradually if you have sensitive skin; patch-test if unsure.

safety_block.title: Safety & Side Effects
safety_block.text: May cause mild tingling in sensitive skin. Stop if severe irritation occurs.
